title: Cincinnati Bengals
description:
This is the official mobile app of the Cincinnati Bengals. Make your Android device a unique part of your gameday experience for Bengals games. Want to catch breaking news of the team? See real-time statistics for every drive? Watch video-on-demand clips of press conferences and player interviews? Follow postgame blogs and pregame previews of the matchups?
Now, you can stay in touch with the Bengals anytime, anywhere, on your Android device.
Features include:
– News: Real-time breaking news from the Bengals, previews of upcoming matchups, postgame news and blogs
– Video: Video-on-demand clips of Bengals press conferences, and coach and player interviews
– Photos: Gallery of game-time action
– Stats: Real-time statistics and scores from the official NFL stats engine, head-to-head stats of the matchup, player stats, drive-by-drive stats, box score, out-of-town scores around the league
– Standings: Division and conference standings
– Fantasy: Keep track of your favorite fantasy players
– Depth chart: Shown by offense, defense and special teams
– Social media: Aggregated twitter of the Bengals official tweets, check in to the stadium on gameday, one-click tweet of all media items, one-click Facebook posting of all media items
– Schedule: Schedule of upcoming games, and scores/stats of previous games from the season, ticket purchase for games
– Evolving home-screen: Pregame, in-game, postgame, offseason countdown, draft-day
Follow us @bengals on Twitter for updates or visit bengals.com.
Follow us @yinzcam on Twitter for updates or to ask questions and provide feedback.
